title: Lab Technician,Lab Assistant,Laboratory Technician,Lab Incharge
jd: Description :1. This position is responsible for the technical and scientific operation of the laboratories under his/her operation.2. The position administers those functions, which results and support in the reporting of laboratory results by planning, monitoring, and appraising functional competency.3. The position is also responsible for enforcement of policies, which assures compliance with standards and accreditation requirements specified by clinical laboratory accrediting agencies such as CAAP/NABL/ISO/State and Central Govt Guidelines.4. The position would ensure the implementation of Quality Management System.5. This position is responsible for the supervision of the Inventory Management and Pilferage Control.6. The position is also responsible for communication with peripheral clients like other Labs, Patients, technicians and management for all operational concerns.7. The position would ensure that personnel employed within the laboratory possess the competence to perform assigned functions and meet educational and training requirements.8. This position is responsible for supervision of technical personnel, to assure that staffing is adequate to competently perform the scope, volume and complexity of testing performed in the laboratories under his/her jurisdiction.9. The position is responsible to assure that the facilities, equipment and working environment are adequate and conducive to the technical & overall working of the clinical reference laboratory.10. The position is that of a leader who regularly communicates with technical personnel, to ensure appropriate staffing, identify potential problems and maintain processes which provide for the effective & efficient review of clinical laboratory test results prior to release.11. The position is responsible to address any complaint, request or suggestion from staff / or users of laboratory services.12. The position is responsible to design and implement a contingency plan to ensure that essential services are available during emergency situations or other conditions when laboratory services are limited or unavailable.13. The position is responsible for executing his/her administrative and managerial duties in an organized manner.
location: Ahmedabad,  Bengaluru / Bangalore,  Hyderabad/Secunderabad,  Kolkata,  Mumbai
skills: Lab Technician, Lab Assistant, Laboratory Technician, Lab Chemist, Lab Incharge

title: Treasurer
jd: Do you want to take your professional career to new heights and truly make a difference? Join our team today. We take on thousands of projects annually, in both local and international locations, so you will have the chance to travel and participate in a wide variety of new challenges. Our company is dedicated to developing innovative solutions. If you are passionate, detail-oriented, and ready to develop unique processes and methods from the ground up, we are excited to work with you.Treasurer Job Responsibilities:Analyzes and recommends optimal capital structure alternatives and roadmap to implementation.Evaluates the companys borrowing capacity and optimal use of debt to finance future growth, focusing on current and future leverage metrics and rating agency implications.Supports and manages financial structure, negotiating and executing financing transactions as needed, including bank facilities, debt financing, lenders, documentation review and covenants.Executes stock repurchase program execution, foreign currency hedging support, and investment management.Ensures Treasury strategies are aligned to support business growth while minimizing risk.Guarantees global banking needs are sufficient to support the business.Develops a strategy and corresponding policies and procedures for the company s global banking structure.Enhances operational efficiency, while minimizing risk and banking fees.Compiles information from around the company to create a routine cash forecasting process, understanding the impact of working capital policies, accounting methods, capital projections, and board authorizations.Creates a strategy and policy for investing cash as appropriate, while ensuring operational flexibility and preservation of capital.Anticipates cash needs and make recommendations to the Executive Staff and BOD for raising funds through the acquisition of debt, sale of stock, or changes in company policies that impact the amount of working capital required to run the business.Manages the credit and collections process.
location: Bengaluru / Bangalore,  Bidar,  Davanagere,  Dharwad,  Gulbarga
skills: Financial planning and strategy, Strategic planning and vision, Forecasting, Corporate finance, Budget development

title: Senior Big Data Engineer
jd: Job Summary As a Big Data Engineer, you will be a member of a small, agile team of data engineers responsible for developing an innovative big data platform as a service for enterprises that need to manage mission critical data and diverse application stakeholders at scale. The platform manages data ingestion, warehousing, and governance, and enables developers to quickly create complex queries. The platform provides automatic scaling and elasticity to enable efficient use of resources, and provides services such as security, logging, and data provenance so that third party developers can focus their energy on algorithms rather than administration. We're looking for engineers who want a technical challenge. Help us improve the platform for our current customers and develop new capabilities for our future customers.Responsibilities Senior Big Data Engineer is an integral part of the Data Science Innovation team that works closely with Internal/External customer in all phases of the development.Work with key stakeholders and understand their needs to develop new or improve existing solutions around data and analytics.Work in a cross-functional, matrix organization, at times under ambiguous circumstances.Partner in development of scalable solutions using large datasets with other data scientists on the teamResearch innovative data solutions to solve real market problems.Conceptualize, analyze and develop actionable recommendations for strategic challenges facing the organization.Manage data analysis to develop fact-based recommendations for innovation projects.Mine Big Data and other unstructured data to tap untouched data sources and deliver insight into new and emerging solutions.Work with cross-functional teams to develop ideas and execute business plans.Remain current on new developments in data analytics, Big Data, predictive analytics, and technology.
location: Ahmedabad,  Bengaluru / Bangalore,  Chennai,  Delhi,  Delhi/NCR
skills: Java, predictive analytics, Big Data Engineer, Scala, Python, MYSQL, MS SQL, NOSQL, Big Data, Hadoop, c ++, Html, Oracle, Linux, Visual Basic

title: Urdu Personalized Internet Assessor
jd: Are you looking for a role that gives you the opportunity to work with one of Americas top 100 most trusted Companies while also increasing your income from the comfort of your home? Then why not join Lionbridge as a part-time Independent Contractor. We are currently recruiting for the role of Personalized Internet Assessor in India.What does the role involve?In this role you will be reviewing online search results in order to improve their content and quality. You will be required to provide feedback and analysis on content found in search engine results and provide ratings on their relevance to the search terms used. Another aspect of this role will involve reviewing the language used in the search results by examining grammar, tone and cultural relevance.Through this work you will be making a valuable contribution by expressing your opinion on the quality and content of what is currently out there on the web. You will play a part in improving the quality of one of the largest search engines in the world using both your PC and required Smartphone device.Who is suitable for this role?We are currently seeking dynamic and creative people who have a strong interest in social media, specifically those who are an active daily user of their Gmail account. We also require suitable candidates to own & use a smartphone Android or iPhone and have a familiarity with other forms of social media and Google products. You should also be flexible, reliable and have the ability to interpret and follow established guidelines.You will have the flexibility and freedom to work from your own home, working your own hours. Hours for this role are a minimum of 10 up to 20 hours per week depending on task availability. We are currently seeking people who have a specific smartphone device (Android V4.2 or higher or iPhone running iOS version 9.0 or higher) to complete tasks. What are the main requirements for the role?You must be fluent in written and verbal English and UrduYou must be living in India for the last 5 consecutive yearsYou must own and use a Smartphone (Android V4.2 or higher or iPhone running iOS version 9.0 or higher) to complete tasksThe majority of the task types will require both a desktop/laptop and a SmartphoneGmail must be your primary email accountActive daily user of Gmail and other forms of social media (Twitter & Facebook)You must have familiarity with current and historical business, media, sport, news, social media and cultural affairs in IndiaAccess to and use of a broadband internet connection and associated computer and software to perform the work, all provided at your own expenseExperience in use of web browsers to navigate and interact with a variety of content Whats next? Don t Delay! Submit your application through the below link using a desktop PC/Laptop:https://goo.gl/oV6HTg A member of our recruitment team will review your application. Please Note: We are unable to offer more than one Personalized Social Media Internet Assessor position per IP address.Only one member per household may apply.
location: Bengaluru / Bangalore,  Delhi,  Delhi/NCR,  Hyderabad/Secunderabad,  Lucknow
skills: Urdu, English Language, Internet, Web surfing, Smartphone, Android, iPhone, web Browser, Internet Search, online content

title: Software Test Engineer
jd: Purpose of the job:As a Software Test Engineer you will be involved in systems and products development included in the ETCS/ERTMS onboard solutions and support in the adaptation and application of Bombardier ERTMS products.Key responsibilities:- Prepare Test Plans in order to verify and ensure that the system meets its design specifications and requirements within the project.- Write Test Specification, Test Environment Specification, Test Record and Test Reports.- Develop and execute test cases and related scripts for scenario-based testing in lab environment.- Analyse test results and reported deviations from expected system behaviour.- Support lab configuration setup according to technical specifications.- Plan, coordinate and support of System Integration activities.- Support Project Management, Project Engineering and System Engineering.- Re-create, analyse and suggest potential solutions of reported errors.- Interface with several internal departments, suppliers and customers.- Participates in technical document reviews and prepare documents for submission to the customers and suppliers.Qualifications- Bachelors or masters degree in Electrical/Electronic, Transportation, Automation, IT or equivalent work experience.- Relevant previous experience in system integration, testing and writing documentation in development projects.- Good understanding of HW and SW interactions within complex system architectures.- ISTQB/ISEB Certification is an advantage- Experience of ERTMS or other safety-critical systems is highly valued.- Knowledge of job-specific tools (C, C , C #, Linux, VectorCAST) is desirable.- English language skills required, other European language, such as German or French, represents an advantage to the role.
location: Ahmedabad,  Bengaluru / Bangalore,  Chennai,  Delhi,  Delhi/NCR
skills: Software Test Engineer, senior test engineer, test lead, test engineer, tester, manual tester, qa tester, manual testing, testing engineer, technical support associate

title: Product Manufacturing Engineer
jd: Responsibilities:Interfaces with Engineering functions to coordinate the release of New Products or/and product improvements. Owns Module/Product on PLC/CIP ProgramLaunches, releases, approves, and implements engineering change orders as required to support design engineering and floor for new/existing products. Owns SMBOM Release to support Phase exitsAbility to process Non Standard request (BOM) for Systems and NSOSupports New Product documentation by OMS Creation for NPI/CIP BuildsCreates/maintains Master layout in UG/NX (Models of New Products)Develops project methodology and/or project proposals.Participates in preparation of concept and feasibility studies.Interfaces between operations, design engineering & Global Product management to implement most feasible solution.Makes recommendations for tooling and process requirements. Uses DFx principles to reduce manufacturing and/or product costs and improve delivered product quality.Participates in New Product Builds & Champions issue resolution. Determines root cause analysis for issues that arise during assembly and/or test of systems; provides Long term corrective action.Engage with Volume Manufacturing Engineers, New Product Manufacturing Engineers, NPT PMs, Materials, Manufacturing Techs and Suppliers to transition from NPI operations to Volume ManufacturingHas extensive knowledge of Design / Manufacturing Process, best known methods, procedures and policies.Participates in the development and maintenance of new business processes; edits as necessary to ensure current practices are documentedPerforms other duties as assigned. Duties will vary according to the project in progress and/or the specific goals of the department in which the incumbent works.Job Specific KnowledgeRequires demonstrated knowledge of manufacturing engineering discipline, theories, practices and principles.Requires knowledge necessary to perform the job function such as an understanding of the engineering change order process, DFx (Design for Excellence) engineering principles, product development process, value engineering, engineering specification waiver process, Producibility / manufacturability analysis, product structure, bill of materials, product safety requirements, material handling, and root cause analysis.One should have demonstrated the knowledge on the products, configurations, Team Center and Options & Variants.Hands on Experience in creation and Maintenance of New Options & providing Variant Conditions.Skills:Requires strong skills in Product technology, Change management, problem solving, communication skills, customer orientation, personal effectiveness, team skills, and quality.In depth knowledge of CAD tools (UG-NX & Team center), SAP BOM & ECO is a mustRequires additional knowledge of systems and software necessary such as MS Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Flowcharting, FRACAS, and/or BRIO.
location: Ahmedabad,  Bengaluru / Bangalore,  Chennai,  Delhi,  Delhi/NCR
